children.value: Elon Musk's twitter began hitting the national media with a tweet saying he would make Tesla private if reaching $420 on August 7, 2018. This algorithm our team created we presented at the Data Science Institute at UVA on June 4, 2018,
two months prior to this tweet
. So we were correct on our hunch!

frontmatter.subtitle: Using sentiment analysis of Elon Musk's tweets to guide trading of Tesla stock.
frontmatter.title: Trading Algorithm by Twitter Sentiment Analysis
frontmatter.label: Info
